method.name: GET
method.doc: Provides access to Freebase data given a free text query.

param.name: query
param.doc: The text you want to match against freebase entities.

param.name: callback
param.doc: JS method name for JSONP callbacks.

param.name: domain
param.doc: Comma separated list of domain IDs. Search results must include these domains.

param.name: filter
param.doc: Filter s-expression.

param.name: html_escape
param.doc: Whether or not to escape entities.

param.name: indent
param.doc: Whether to indent the json.

param.name: limit
param.doc: Return up to this number of results.

param.name: mql_output
param.doc: MQL query thats extracts entity information.

param.name: prefixed
param.doc: Whether or not to match by name prefix (used for autosuggest).

param.name: start
param.doc: Allows paging through results.

param.name: type
param.doc: Comma seperated list of type IDs. Search results must include these types.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Provides access to the freebase database using the Metaweb query language (MQL).

param.name: query
param.doc: The text you want to match against freebase entities.

param.name: as_of_time
param.doc: Run the query as it would've been run at the specified point in time. Must be a valid timestamp (e.g. "2007-01-09T22" or "2007-02").

param.name: callback
param.doc: JS method name for JSONP callbacks.

param.name: cursor
param.doc: Provides a mechanism for "paging" out results (can be used in conjunction with "limit" directive in MQL). No value (for the first request) OR a valid cursor returned by a previous request.

param.name: html_escape
param.doc: Whether or not to escape entities.

param.name: indent
param.doc: Whether to indent the json.

param.name: lang
param.doc: Return strings in the language requested (if a given object has no name in the requested language, null will be returned).

param.name: cost
param.doc: Whether or not to show the costs.

param.name: uniqueness_failure
param.doc: How MQL responds to uniqueness failures.
